ComicInfo.Summary: Titans Hunt, Chapter Four: Masks: As Mal Duncan goes missing and comes face-to-face with Mister Twister, Dick Grayson convinces Donna Troy and Garth to team up with him to solve their shared mystery, Gnarrk and Roy Harper head off to find Lilith, and Hawk tries to recall just who it was who has died.
ComicInfo.Tags: Beast Boy,The Titans,Lilith Clay,Don Hall,Donna Troy,Roy Harper,Hawk & Dove,Jung-Mo Song,Dawn Granger,Tempest,Hank Hall,Gnarrk,Mister Twister,Bumblebee,Dick Grayson,Teen Titans,Herald
ComicInfo.Title: Titans Hunt, Chapter Four: Masks
